Fortnite Wikipedia Fortnite From Wikipedia free encyclopedia Jump navigation Jump search Not be confused with fortnight video game developed by Epic Games Fortnite Genre s Survival battle royale sandbox Developer s Epic Games Publisher s Epic Games Warner Bros Interactive Entertainment Platform s Windows macOS Nintendo Switch PlayStation Xbox One iOS Android First release Fortnite Save World July Fortnite an online video game developed by Epic Games released in It available in three distinct game mode versions that otherwise share same general gameplay game engine Fortnite Save World cooperative shooter survival game up four players fight off zombie like creatures defend objects with fortifications they can build Fortnite Battle Royale free play battle royale game up players fight be last person standing Fortnite Creative players are given complete freedom create worlds battle arenas first two game modes were released in as early access titles Creative was released on December Save World available only Windows macOS PlayStation Xbox One while Battle Royale Creative released those platforms in addition Nintendo Switch iOS Android devices While first two games have been successful Epic Games Fortnite Battle Royale became resounding success drawing in more than million players in less than year earning hundreds millions dollars per month since has become cultural phenomenon Contents Game modes Development Fortnite Save World Fortnite Battle Royale Fortnite Creative Reception Awards References External links Game modes Currently Fortnite distributed as three different game modes using same engine has similar graphics art assets game mechanics Fortnite Save World designed as player versus environment game with four players cooperating towards common objective on various missions game set after fluke storm appears across Earth causing population disappear survivors be attacked by zombie like husks players take role commanders home base shelters collecting resources saving survivors defending equipment that help either collect data on storm push back storm From missions players are awarded number in game items which include hero characters weapon trap schematics survivors all which can be leveled up through gained experience improve attributes Fortnite Battle Royale player versus player battle royale game up players allowing one play alone in duo in squad usually consisting three four players Weaponless players airdrop from Battle Bus that crosses game s map they land they must scavenge weapons items resources even vehicles while trying stay alive attack other players eliminating them Over course round safe area map shrinks down in size due an incoming storm players outside that safe area take damage can be eliminated if they fail quickly evacuate This forces remaining players into tighter spaces encourages player encounters last player duo squad remaining winner Fortnite Creative sandbox game mode players are given complete freedom create anything they want on an island such as battle arenas race courses platforming challenges more Epic Games reviews some most popular creations from Creative rotate these into Battle Royale map in an area called Block Featured creations are also shown in Creative Hub In first two modes players can use pickaxe knock down existing structures on map collect basic resources that are wood brick metal Subsequently in all modes player can use these materials build fortifications with such as walls floors stairs Such fortification pieces can be edited add things like windows doors materials used have different durability properties can be updated stronger variants using more materials same type Within Save World this enables players create defensive fortifications around an objective trap filled tunnels lure husks through In Battle Royale this provides means quickly traverse map protect oneself from enemy fire delay an advancing foe Players are encouraged be very creative in designing fortifications in Creative All game modes are set be free play titles though as Save World in early access requires purchase play first two games are monetized through use V Bucks in game currency that can be purchased with real world funds but also earned through completing missions other achievements in Save World V Bucks in Save World can be used buy pinatas shaped like llamas gain random selection items In Battle Royale V Bucks can be used buy cosmetic items like character models like can also be used purchase game s Battle Pass tiered progression customization rewards gaining experience completing certain objectives during course Battle Royale season Development Fortnite Save World Main article Fortnite Save World Development Fortnite began from an internal game jam at Epic Games following publishing Gears War around Though it was not initially one developed titles during jam concept merging construction game genre representing games like Minecraft Terraria shooter games arose leading foundation Fortnite Development Fortnite slowed due several issues including switching from Unreal Engine Unreal Engine deeper role playing game approach extend life game switch art style from dark theme more cartoonish style Further Epic was looking get into games as service model brought in Chinese publisher Tencent help Tencent took large stake in Epic as part this leading departure several executives including Cliff Bleszinski had been key part Fortnite s development Fortnite s approach was changed be Epic s testbed games as service further slowed development Ultimately Epic was able prepare release Fortnite as paid early access title in July with plans release it as free play sometime in while gaining feedback from players improve game With release Fortnite Battle Royale player versus environment mode was distinguished as Save World Fortnite Battle Royale Main article Fortnite Battle Royale Development Near same time that Epic released Fortnite into early access PlayerUnknown s Battlegrounds had become worldwide phenomenon having sold over million copies three months from its March release drawing strong interest in battle royale genre Epic recognized that with Fortnite base game they could also do battle royale mode rapidly developed own version atop Fortnite in about two months By September Epic was ready release this as second mode from Save World in paid earlier access but then later decided release it as free game Fortnite Battle Royale supported with microtransactions This version quickly gained players with over million players during its first two weeks release leading Epic create separate teams continue Fortnite Battle Royale development apart from Save World mode outside common engine elements art assets This allowed Fortnite Battle Royale expand other platforms otherwise not supported by Save World mode including iOS Android mobile devices Nintendo Switch Fortnite Creative Main article Fortnite Creative creative mode launched on December coincident with start Season Fortnite Battle Royale Here each player has access private persistent island which they construct buildings add manipulate objects as desired Players are able invite friends this island participate in unofficial games such as race tracks jumping courses Initially only players bought Battle Pass could get own private island but players didn t purchase it got access this game mode free on December Reception Fortnite Pro Am event at E See also Fortnite Save World Reception Fortnite Battle Royale Reception With all modes Fortnite still considered be early access journalists have yet provide comprehensive reviews any mode Save World mode achieved over one million players by August just prior release Battle Royale Fortnite Battle Royale on other hand became significant financial success Epic Games leading them separate teams between Save World Battle Royale provide better support both modes Within two weeks release over million players had played mode by June just after Nintendo Switch release had reached million players Revenue from Fortnite Battle Royale during first half had been estimated in hundreds millions dollars per month with total revenue estimated at billion by analysis firm SuperData Research Fortnite Battle Royale has also become cultural online phenomenon with several celebrities reporting they play game athletes using Fortnite emotes as victory celebrations notable streaming event in March with streamer Ninja playing Fortnite Battle Royale alongside Drake Travis Scott Kim DotCom Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver JuJu Smith Schuster broke viewership records Twitch date led Epic arranging Fortnite Battle Royale pro am with pairs streamers professional players matched with celebrities at E in June Epic Games has developed organized esports competitions around Fortnite Battle Royale such as inaugural US million Fortnite World Cup tournament that took place in July has also been growing concern over Fortnite Battle Royale s draw toward young children emphasized with release mobile client Parents teachers had expressed concern that students are being distracted drawn away from school work due playing Fortnite Concerns have also been raised about impact that playing game involving repeated depictions gun violence may have on young children Awards In game was nominated Best Co op Game by PC Gamer Best Spectator Game by IGN In game won award Best Ongoing Game by PC Gamer IGN latter which nominated it Best Nintendo Switch Game Best Mobile Game Best Action
